title: This Brand Changed Its Logo As A Gesture To Thank Women
text:
facebook 522 SHARES 
As women all over were celebrating a day dedicated to them, somebody took it upon themselves to make us feel even more special. In a bid to honour every woman out there, a brand did something that has never been done before. This brand that caters mainly to women, found that simply celebrating the awesomeness that women are isn't enough. Women need recognition, love, respect and most importantly a broader platform to shout about all the wonderful things that we stand for. 
With their huge line of hair removal products, Veet decided to change the logo of their brand on all their social platforms to honour women and their indomitable spirit. Here's what their new logo looks like: 
Joining the brand in their one-of-its-kind campaign is the brand ambassador Shraddha Kapoor. She also sent out warm wishes to everyone through their social platform. 
Hat's off to the amazing team of Veet, for making us women feel loved.
